Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The people here are talking about diverse topics ranging from the federal budget to scholarship programs to tense politics. Experts in economics are anticipating the release of the federal budget which is just around the corner. Meanwhile politicians are anxious for one of their colleagues to decide whether he will abandon the party and run independently in the upcoming election. Lastly it seems the teaching profession is getting some much needed help with the inclusion of 5000 scholarships in the federal budget to keep more students in the classroom.
